familyMemberEthics.description: Former member of Trump Plaza LLC, in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. In 2017, Pres. Trump earned $1,000,001 - $5,000,000 in rent income from TRUMP PLAZA LLC, valued at $25,000,001 - $50,000,000. Underlying Assets: residential & commercial real estate. Location: New York, NY. familyMemberEthics.description: Former president/director/treasurer of Trump Plaza Member Inc. (F/K/A Trump Plaza Corp.), in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and is part of other entity structures.
